title: Counterplaying Yi
body: How is it done. Alpha strike is impossible to play around. Makes him invulnerable, untargetable, hits multiple targets drops tower aggro AND acts as a range closer. Is there a strat for dealing with this bullshit?

replies.body: yi is a fighter assasin, if ur tanky u can get away probs, if ur mid you probably have some form of cc, if ur jg yi doesnt have good counterjungle,, if ur adc, you support may be able to protect you, if your support, heal yourself and the adc, or cc yi to death depending on what kinda support u r, i forget if yi's Q tp him slightly behind target or infront tho

Teamwork is the best advice in this thread. This includes communicating where he is, warding often, and target focus in fights. And remember not to take a 5 v 4 fight if you'll only barely win it, because he will come through and hammer you all in a clean-up. Why is YI broken in low elo?

in truth i have no idea, he has enough lifesteal to make thornmail redundant.
Randuins and frozen heart don't seem to slow him down that much.
I cant even say "focus him" because your team should be focusing Vayne not Yi.

You can 'counter pick' him effectively with champs like Rammus or Fiddlesticks, but in terms of 'counterplay' I'm afraid i don't really know.

Champions like Shen, can hold him off long enough (using his E and W one after the other.) for you or your team to burst him down. But again that requires you to happen to have a Shen (which obviously isnt' helpful if you don't have one).

Yi can't do all of the things you've mentioned at the same time because they are bound to the same skill and share the same CD. The CD is also rather to very long in terms of normal spells because it's nearly 20 seconds long at skill-lvl1 and nearly 15 seconds long at skill-lvl5 when no CDR. The fact the vast majority of this champion's strength is built entirely in that skill alone and that it has a rather long CD, this actually makes him very counter-able rather than the opposite. He also has no CC of their own, nor does he have a reliable escapes (and he has NO escapes prior to lvl6) and his own saving-grace also stuns himself and it's on a ridiculous CD for a normal spell, being constant 35 seconds when no CDR.

He has a hard counterplay called "team-work", not kidding, literally any kind of teamwork wrecks this guy. Team coordination destroys him, CC fondles him in the ass, and the notion of not getting enough farms/kills early also completely screw him over later (unless you could make bruiser Yi work, dunno if it's still possible now). Not to mention the counterplay items such as Randuin's Omen, Frozen Heart, Thornmail etc.

There is a reason why besides the period when a certain or 2 items were broken, or the constant revival of AP Yi in its various incarnations, he's really only a thing in low elo region with only a small handful of them beyond that.
Hard cc before he gets to you, snares, stuns and roots, then run like hell or in my case as a supp main i tend to buy randuins and frozen heart to stop him as much as is possible
